Uptown apartment.description: A residential apartment in the northwestern part of the town.

Midtown apartment.description: A residential apartment in the western part of the town.

Office.description: An office building in the town. One of the two major industries in the town.

Factory.description: A factory in the town. One of the two major industries in the town.

School.description: The only school in the town that enrolls both elementary and high school students.

Supermarket.description: A supermarket in the town where you can buy household items.

Hospital.description: The only hospital in the town.

Gym.description: A gym where you can do various sports, such as basketball, swimming, yoga, and all sorts of training. A good place for exercise.

Food court.description: An open, shared seating area surrounded by multiple food vendors or kiosks. A good place for socializing and eating.

Coffee shop.description: A nice coffee shop. A good place for socializing and drinking.

Amusement park.description: A theme park with various entertainment facilities (such as a Ferris wheel, roller coaster, and water park. A good place for family relaxation and fun.

Cinema.description: A cinema. A good place for relaxation and watching movies.

Museum.description: A museum with exhibitions of various cultural, artistic, and technological artifacts. A good place for learning about history and culture, and to discover new things.
